Commission Members

NameNominating AuthorityTerm Expires
Felicia Williams, ChairMayor6/30/20
Michael CoppessAt Large/Dist. 46/30/23
David CoherDistrict 16/30/22
Blair MillerDistrict 26/30/23
Steven OlivasDistrict 36/30/21
Donald C. NanneyDistrict 46/30/21
Tim WendlerDistrict 56/30/19
Ali BararDistrict 66/30/21
D. Jason LyonDistrict 76/30/22

Composition

9 members. Pasadena residency required. Members are required to file annual Statements of Economic Interest.

Description

Advisory to the City Council on the preparation and review of the General Plan, as well as the adoption or implementation of programs under the Plan, including the creation of districts and zones, modification to and administration of zoning regulations, review of the capital improvements program, and review of other programs and projects which affect city development.

Term of Office

Three years, limited to two consecutive terms.

Pasadena City Hall

100 North Garfield Ave.
Pasadena, CA 91101
